column1: Jones was born in Clinton, Indiana.
He left the Manned Spaceflight Engineer program in 1987.
He was killed at the age of 48 in the attacks of September 11, 2001, aboard American Airlines Flight 11.
He had been living as a retired US Air Force Colonel in Bedford, Massachusetts, at the time of his death.
He was survived by his wife Jeanette.
At the National 9/11 Memorial, Jones is memorialized at the North Pool, on Panel N-74.
